mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rent ( rent_no , rent_startdate , rent_enddate , book_no , user_id , rent_check , branch_code ) VALUES ( 0 , DATE(NOW()) , date_add(date_format(now(),'%y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 7 DAY) , #{book_no} , #{user_id} , 0 , #{branch_code})
mapper.select: SELECT b.book_title , b.book_author , b.book_no , a.rent_startdate , a.rent_enddate , a.branch_code , c.branch_name FROM rent a, book b, branch c WHERE b.book_no = a.book_no AND a.branch_code= c.branch_code AND a.user_id = #{user_id} AND a.rent_check=1
mapper.update: UPDATE rent SET rent_returnday = curdate(), rent_check = null WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND book_no = #{book_no}
